nodes.text: The Hanofar system was located in the Southern Core portion of the Colonies. It contained the terrestrial world Hanofar. Early during the Galactic Civil War, Hanofar was held by the Galactic Empire and was the site of protests against Imperial taxation which eventually grew violent and led to skirmishes with Imperial forces.
The Hanofar system was first mentioned in 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-13.
